page.title: 11TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: My name is Emma. I usually get up at 7.30 and after getting dressed and having breakfast I have a play with my cat before I go to school.Normally at school we do maths and English in the mornings and in the afternoons we do Topic, painting, sewing, drawing or clay work. We have a 15 minute playtime in the morning and one and a half hours for lunch. Istay at school and play all kinds of games with my friends in my class.When I go home at 3.30 I have a drink and play with my cat.Sometimes I go to play with my friends who live nearby. Then when dad comes home from work we have tea.After tea Iwatch some television or have a fight with my brother. At 7>30 I get ready for bed. When I am in bed Iread for about 20 minutes then my mummy or daddy switches off my light.
